reviewText:
The French creativity in the genre of light comedy has been notable in the last decade: The placard, Amelie, Delicatessen are titles that have shocked the entire world.

The innovativeness of this bitter comedy has to do with the disinterested efforts of a good Samaritan respect a man at the eve to commit suicide in park at midnight.

But the rest of this amusing and funny plot runs for you. Please, take your time and decide to have ninety minutes of terrific performances, plenty of fine and black humor.
